thread.title: Ghanaian clubs continue to fall in Africa ranking; Kotoko in 36th spot, Hearts of Oak ranked 96th
thread.title_full: Ghanaian clubs continue to fall in Africa ranking; Kotoko in 36th spot, Hearts of Oak ranked 96th

title: Ghanaian clubs continue to fall in Africa ranking; Kotoko in 36th spot, Hearts of Oak ranked 96th
text:
Sports News | 17 October 2015 15:10 CET Ghanaian clubs continue to fall in Africa ranking; Kotoko in 36th spot, Hearts of Oak ranked 96th - www.ghanasoccernet.com Hearts of Oak and Asante Kotoko 
No Ghanaian club made it into the top 30 clubs on the continent in the latest annual rankings released by FootballDatabase. 
The website allocates points based on the club's performances in CAF region. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us First they ignore you, then they laugh at you Then they fight you and then ... you win By: Mahatma Gandhi
